    • enqueueLog

      public boolean enqueueLog(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path wal, String walGroupId)
      Enqueue the wal
      Parameters:
      wal - wal to be enqueued
      walGroupId - Key for the wal in @queues map
      Returns:
      boolean whether this is the first time we are seeing this walGroupId.
